This map contains information on the location and contact information for every charity listed in the charity commission that include amateur sport and recreation, disability and disabled people, or both, in their area of focus. The penguin icons indicate partners in the [Get Yourself Active](http://www.getyourselfactive.org/) programme

To search by name use the search box in the table beneath the map. 

To see more columns, click on the 'Column Visibility' button.

This app has the function to filter charities by income, which is useful if you are looking for charities of a particular size.

#### Download

To download information in a CSV file format, which can be opened in Excel or other spreadsheet programmes, click the 'Download CSV File' button on the right-hand side of the app.




#### Assistance

If you need any help using this map, or have any suggestions, questions or comment, please contact [Evan Odell](mailto:evan.odell@disabilityrightsuk.org)
